title: So I looked over at M&G thinking they'd have some funny posts
body:
Jesus christ it's unimaginative cringey shit.

"when someone uses your main better than you"

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmedia0.giphy.com%2Fmedia%2FhJMQlbbK3eg6c%2Fgiphy.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

How does that have anything to do with it? I'd be ashamed for posting and wished it could be closed by being downvoted into oblivion.

"When you're fed"

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnew2.fjcdn.com%2Fthumbnails%2Fcomments%2F5260503%2B_7b3371a98e3cf7f16d198ba930f32828.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

The fuck? Again, nothing to do with league. It's something that is minorly related to killing or owning something and thrown into something completely unrelated.

"If Champions worked at Mcdonalds.."

I'll stop right here.

Let's show what **GD** has to offer.

http://i.gyazo.com/e50dd14cd5ff686b103d961508b3b35b.png

This is funny.

http://i.gyazo.com/c132045d85bf9d71d35d4de6acdd6aa7.png

**This** is a meme. This is league related. How the fuck is GD of all places more league related than the largest upvoted topics in M&G?

http://i.gyazo.com/a6b001bfea56251e61dc8d37b44c41ea.png

http://i.imgur.com/1YwdO45.gif%5B/img%5D

This is us voicing an opinion that isn't circlejerking Riot.

http://i.gyazo.com/8fdcd29eac7b14a8e68b0dc0f20397d9.png

THIS IS A FUCKING MEME.

http://i.gyazo.com/8550b6525b06ed9bb33e3a381691bfaf.png

THIS IS A LEGEND.

http://i.gyazo.com/e5c81e91f5a1dc88b887902711ac1c36.png

THIS IS GARBAGE.
